trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked say [Enter 2 numbers and I'll tell you if the second number is a divisor of the first number.] for (5) secs ask [Enter the 1st number:] and wait set [number1 v] to (answer) ask [Enter the 2nd number:] and wait set [number2 v] to (answer) if <((number1) mod (number2)) = [0]> then say (join (join (number2) [ is a divisor of the number ]) (number1)) else say (join (join (number2) [ is not a divisor of the number ]) (number1)) end
